org.grandviewtech.entity.bo.Routine.name: XOR WITH BOTH DATA VARIABLE
org.grandviewtech.entity.bo.Routine.functionalBlock:
MOV DPTR,#D2008L ; D2008 IS THE SOURCE1 LOCATION MOVX A,@DPTR MOV TEMP11,A MOV DPTR,#D2009L ; D2009 IS THE SOURCE2 LOCATION MOVX A,@DPTR XRL A,TEMP
MOV DPTR,#D2010L ;D2010 IS THE RESULT LOCATION MOVX @DPTR,A
MOV DPTR,#D2008H MOVX A,@DPTR MOV TEMP,A MOV DPTR,#D2009H MOVX A,@DPTR XRL A,TEMP MOV DPTR,#D2010H MOVX @DPTR,A
